english.segment1: Stand and lift your head. Redemption is drawing near. The armies of heaven, are riding in the air.
english.segment2: Look into the clouds, every eye will see, Christ coming down. So shall it be.
english.segment3: Like lightining through the sky, everyone will know, Jesus is alive, and reigns forevermore.
english.segment4: Look into the clouds, every eye will see, Christ is coming down. So shall it be.
english.segment5: Christ coming down, so shall it be.
